review: This item seemed like the best thing since sliced bread. it has awesome stuff like Netflix, games, movies, photos right from your smart phone and more!! But then it started freezing during Netflix shows and had to reload several times. I thought it was my internet.... So I doubled my speed to 30mbps and even a week later it still can't watch a show all the way through.  And in case you figured I have too many devices on the network, I shut the wifi off on all devices.  Still doesn't work right. It feels like it's 500 degrees on the stick too.
